title: Thoughts on Prudent Innovation in the Payment System
content: For release on delivery  12:30 p.m. EST  November 30, 2017      Thoughts on Prudent Innovation in the Payment System         Remarks by     Randal Quarles     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     2017 Financial Stability and Fintech Conference  sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, the Office of Financial Research,   and the University of Maryland’s Robert H. Smith School of Business     Washington, D.C.                 November 30, 2017
